name: Die Escape
description:
Summary
Created for GMTK 2022.

This is a top down puzzle game, where you play as a little defective die who is trying to escape a factory as monsters block your way and hunt you down. Dice rolling is a key action, but you must strategize how you want to spend your dice results to fulfill the puzzles.

Collect more dice friends along the way to add to your action power and resources. *Incomplete

Goal
Get through the locked doors to complete the level. Reach the end to escape!

Controls

WASD - Move
Spacebar - Roll dice
Click on dice - Submit die when the puzzles ask for them
